s4444: Year 3: Chu surrounded us; duke fled and returned.
s4463: Zheng Jian Gong Jia, first year. Xi Gong's son.
s4470: Year 18: Together with Jin attacked Zheng.
s4472: Year 13: Attacked Jin; Chu aided us.
s4474: Year 12: Jin led us to attack Zheng.
s4478: Year 14: Jin led us to attack Zheng.
s4484: Year 9: Wang Shu fled to Jin.
s4485: Year 10: Chu and Zheng invaded our western border.
s4489: Year 28: Sent Zi Nang to save Zheng.
s4490: Year 13: Zheng attacked us; Wei came to save.
s4505: Year 29: Together with Zheng attacked Song.
s4506: Year 14: Chu and Zheng attacked us.
s4545: Wu Zhu Fan, first year. Chu defeated us.
s4550: Year 23: Wei Xian Gong came fleeing.
s4561: Year 2: Ji Zi yielded position. Chu attacked us.
s4565: Year 15: Solar eclipse. Qi attacked us.
s4585: Year 3: Jin attacked us; defeated at Zhan Ban.
s4597: Year 17: Qi attacked our northern border.
s4613: Year 18: Together with Jin attacked Qi.
s4618: Year 21: Jin led us to attack Qi.
s4631: Year 4: Together with Wei attacked Qi.
s4635: Year 5: Jin led us to attack Qi.
s4679: Year 7: Luan Ting fled to Qi.
s4709: Year 24: Invaded Qi. Sun eclipsed twice.
s4710: Year 5: Feared Jin and connected with Chu; Yan Zi plotted.
s4716: Year 20: Chu led us to attack Zheng.
